text.value: Please educate the client on danger signs using the job aids
You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Is currently experiencing any of these danger signs?
_Refer and accompany to the health facility immediately._
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
Refer to health facility
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Date cannot be in the future!
Date cannot be in the future!
_After completing this form, kindly submit the Death Report for this person._
_After completing this form, kindly submit the Delivery Report for this delivery to be recorded._
Person to visit health facility alone
Has gone for her ANC visit at the facility this month?
You cannot select 'Was not accompanied' if you have selected another option!
Who accompanied to the clinic during her last ANC visit?
Current EDD in the system is
_Encourage to go for her ANC clinics in order to ensure that she and her baby are healthy and to plan for her delivery._
Date cannot be in the past!
Date cannot be in the past!
What is the date of the next ANC visit?
Would you like to update the EDD
Date cannot be in the future!
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulira kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Chonde phunzitsani mayi woyembekezera za zizindikiro zowopysa pogwilitsa ntchito zipangizo zophunzitsira
Tumizani munthuyo kuchipatala kuti akayezedwe kuthamanga kwa magazi!
Kodi mai oyembekezera akuwona zizindikiro zoopsa izi?
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulira kapenga nkhungu mmaso
_Tumizani mwansanga kuchipatala akakhala ndi zizizndikiro zoopsa!_
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi._
_Mukamaliza kulemba lipoti ili perekani lipoti imfa ya mayi._
_Mukamaliza kulowetsa uthengawu, tumizani zotsatira kuti zikalowetsedwe._
Kodi anapita kusikelo ya amai oyembekezera mwezi uno?
Anamupelekeza ndi ndani ku sikelo ya amai oyembekezera?
Tsiku loyembekezera kuchira lomwe liri mu kaundula:
_Mulimbikitseni mai kuti apite ku sikelo kuti iye ndi mwana womuyembekezerayo akhale athanzi ndi kukonzekera kukachilira ku chipatala._
Tsimikizani tsiku loyembekezera kuchira lomwe liri mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi ndi sikelo iti ya amai oyembekezera yomwe anapita?
Tsatanetsatane wa Sikelo ya Amai Oyembekezera

bind.calculate: if(selected(../danger_signs, 'bleeding') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swelling') or selected(../danger_signs, 'fever') or selected(../danger_signs, 'headache_dizziness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'lower_abdominal_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'convulsions') or selected(../danger_signs, 'water_bag_breaks'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'constipation') or selected(../danger_signs, 'nausea') or selected(../danger_signs, 'muscle_cramps') or selected(../danger_signs, 'haemorrhoids') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')
